resources.string: Do not have an account? Register

About: This app uses NYT Newswire API. It fetches the latest 20 news articles and displays them in a RecyclerView, the user can tap each article and read the full version in their browser. To use the app users must register and sign in using their email address. Authentication is provided by Firebase Authentication. Users can also see their view history. It\'s stored in Cloud Firestore for each user and can be cleared by a press of a button.
